name: Government of Canada Historical Database Project

distribution.name: GC Historial Database Project Agriculture Part 1.xlsx
distribution.description: Comparison of Agriculture and Agri-Foods Canada databases listed in Depository Services Program's 2005 Supplemental Checklist (Canadian federal government databases accessible through the Internet) with web content from 2016. Contributed by a graduate student enrolled in LIS 598: Introduction to Government Information, Winter 2016, School of Library and Information Studies, University of Alberta.

distribution.name: GC Historical Database Project Dept List Aug 2016.xlsx

distribution.name: GC Historical Database Project template.xlsx
distribution.description: Use this file as a template for gathering information about databases available via historical web sites.
